title: Futbol Americas: What 'thing' did we learn from USMNT's poor performances?
description:
On Thursday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez, Sebastian Salazar and Taylor Twellman react to the USMNT's scoreless draw against Saudi Arabia. The guys analyze Gregg Berhalter's system, No. 9's, and center backs. Then Mauricio Pedroza joins the show to recap Mexico's defeat against Colombia. Should Tata Martino change his 4-3-3 formation? Next, Julie Foudy joins the show to discuss the latest USWNT roster drop for friendlies against England and Spain.
